metadata.title: CVE-2018-25100 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The Mojolicious module before 7.66 for Perl may leak cookies in certainsituations related to multiple similar cookies for the same domain. Thisaffects Mojo::UserAgent::CookieJar.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-25100` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmojolicious-perl - 8.33+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmojolicious-perl package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.33+dfsg-1').
